```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() + 
  annotate("label", label = "Yo!!!", x = 4, y = 25, hjust = 1, color = "red") + 
  annotate("text", label = "Yo!!!", x = 4, y = 30, hjust = 1, color = "red")
```
